name: Mr. Fox vs Zombies
description:
Mr. Fox vs Zombies

In this game with Mr.Fox you are armed with a zombie exterminating fire like the classic fire shooter and make quick picks to defeat the zombies. And just when you think you are in control, obstacles like wooden boxes and even zombies appear to make it harder. There are several game modes that guarantee that the fun will last forever!

DISCOVER HUNDREDS OF ZOMBIES
Collect your favorite legends along with hundreds of other hotshots, including creative worlds. Go toe-to-missing-toe with a massive array of zombies at every turn, like Green Zombie and Coco Imp – you’ll even have to protect your brain from rampant Zombies!

POWERFUL FOX
Earn Fox Packets as you play and use them to fuel your fire shooter. Power up attacks, double-down defenses, speed up, and even gain entirely new abilities. Boost your plants to ensure those zombies are lawn-gone!

JOURNEY THROUGH SPACE AND TIME
Battle across crazy worlds, from Ancient Egypt to the Future, and beyond. With more levels, ultra-challenging endless zones, fun mini-games there’s always a new challenge to complete. Plus, ready your best defenses – Mr. Fox is waiting to take you on at the end of every world!
